scenarios.scenario_name: Verify all products have a valid category_id
scenarios.description: This scenario is to ensure that all products in the 'products' table have a valid 'category_id' that exists in the 'categories' table.
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[products] WHERE category_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM [dbo].[categories])) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

scenarios.scenario_name: Verify no product has a null category_id
scenarios.description: This scenario is to ensure that all products in the 'products' table have a 'category_id' and it is not null.
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[products] WHERE category_id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
